reviews.review: Jogo Bem Otimizado Jogo Incrivel Otima Jogabilidade Dlcs Bem Incriveis Mais O Que Não Sai Do Jogo e A Palavra (BUGS) DEAD BY DAYLIGHT Não e Diferente Mais Tirando Isso E Um Otimo Jogo Nota:9/10

Dead by Daylight... Tek kelime ile efsane bir oyun. Tamamlanması gereken jenaratorler,kurtulunması gerek kancalar,kurtarılması gereken arkadaşlar,kırılması gereken totemler,açılması gereken kapılar vs vs. Oyun gerçekten kendisine verilen parayı fazlasıyla hak ediyor.Oyunda bir avcı 4 yada 5 av kişi sayısından bir fazla jenarator tam bir kedi fare kovalamacası .Oyunda heyecan zirvede yakalanma korkusu killerin size yaklaştığında duyduğunuz ninni ses ve şarkılar oyuncuyu germek için fazlasıyla yeterli oluyor Oyunun optimizasyon sorunları yok fakat zaten stabil olmayan av avcı dengesini Nightmare((Freddy)) killer hepten bozuyor,sizi uykuya alıyor ve taki siz jenarator patlatana yada bir arkadaşınız sizi uyandırana kadar yerinizi görebiliyor bence kesinlikle bu killer bu oyunda olmamalıyıdı.Benim bu oyun hakkında fikirlerim bu yönde ve herkese şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum kesinlikle zaman ve para kaybı değil oyun kütüphanesinde yer almaya layık bir oyun. İyi oyunlar :))

Игра идиальна,  рекомендовали друзья и я купил. Играю с друзьями с удовольствием. Графика идеал, но от интернета тоже очень многое зависит. Я встречал много типов сурвов и маньяков в этой игре, но удивляюсь даже сейчас когда поиграл больше 100 часов. Твоё выживание зависит не только от тебя и будет лучше если ты командный игрок т. к. больше шансов на побег. За маньяка играть легко, но опять же, всё зависит от вас,  от того как вы научились играть тем или иным маньяком. Советую поиграть!
if you're new get it if you're an old player run away from this.

This game it a swamp of poor dev decisions and ignorance of bugs and abuse.
Especially with the new update for medals to "attempt to counter face camping," it just feels like you have to tilt out to even get anywhere. Getting 25k points in a round doesn't get you a tick, but 12k does.
Face camping still isn't being punished. Sandbagging and feeding to the killer still isn't being punished.
The devs need to get their heads out of their asses, stop banning streamers and youtubers that point the game out for the shitfest it is, and actually fix it.
Doing 3/5 gens solo and unhooking your team constantly doesn't reward you with a tick but being carried does.
Get your shit together and fix this fucking awful game.

游戏难度整体上来看是一个U型趋势，新手阶段的上手难，之后操作熟练，会感到难度下降。在进入红段之后，竞技强度变得愈加激烈，整个游戏让人感到难度的提升。游戏非对称的机制，人屠双方各有优劣，设定的不断再平衡，都是此游戏经久不衰的原因之一。当然，面对打针对、守尸、速修等情况，还是很让人感到没有游戏体验，但瑕不掩瑜，值得推荐！（道是我无敌的赶！我真的按了！！射哈道格眼！！！）

DBD use to be a fun, changelling game but I feel it has now gone very one sided and requires survivors to do a lot, compete too much with each other and evade the killer for a small amount of points.

It is almost impossible to pip up.  This new emblem system is not survivor friendly at all.  It has helped with getting surviors unhooked but it has caused too much competition between surviors or you cannot pip.

There is a lot of killer camping, both face and distance camping so you cannot save the hooked survior without being downed yourself, which of course hurts other surviors points.  Also, there are so few pallets, you have a difficult time successfully escaping since the killers can get faster but you cannot.   Why can't you make the pallets like the hooks and they come back after 3 or 4 minutes.

Very late to the scene with this one, however a really fun game for the most part, ive largely only played killer and at that mainly the trapper, hes my kind of bad guy ;)

One of its faults is more with the community rather than the game, there does seem to be an awful lot of "taunting" by the survivors, be it using mind numbing loops or straight up body blocking hooks etc, tea bagging all sorts, though when the killer cops the hump and responds in a similar fashion ( camping hooks ) they cry little babys in chat after!

Yes i know two wrongs dont make a right, however, after umpteen games of that behaviour it kinda pisses you off!

Es macht sehr viel Spaß und wird auch auf Dauer nicht langweilig. Besonders der Überleben mit Freunden Modus macht auper viel Spaß. Regelmäßig kommen neue Killer, Maps und Überlebende hinzu wodurch das Spiel immer wieder neue Elemente bekommt. Auch das Layout wird immer mal wieder angepasst. 
Das Spieldesign wird zu bestimmten Zeiten angepasst zb. Halloween oder Weihnachten.
Besonder viel Spaß machen auch die Community Aufgaben oder die Blutpunkteevents.
Sehr zu empfehlen.

Пятница сосет! ДбД решает!
А если серъезно, то действительно по большинству пунтиков ДбД обгоняет Пятницу. Разработчики не забили на данный продукт, всегда появляются свежие патчы, которые исправляют баги и которые пытаются ликвидировать дисбаланс. Ваши шансы на выживания зависят только от игроков (а не от рандомного появления вещей в одном из ста домиков). DLC добавляют в игру новых персонажей (а не новые добивания, костюмы и танцы), но если вы не хотите тратить свои дкюеньги, то вы можете поиграть за DLC мана благодаря специальному подношению, а если вы хотите получить перк DLC персонажа, то при определенных ситуациях он может появиться в Храме ( тем более в будующем разработчики обещают дать персонажей при соблюдении определенных условий).
Перки: Ты волен выбирать сам как будешь прокачиваться, но все равно прокачка зависит от рандома, но не такого как в Пятнице). Вообщем покупайте ДБД и играйте на здоровье. И помните. Сущность, она повсюду...

This game is HEAVILY in favor of Survivors.

Out of all the Killers in the game, including the DLC Killers, only two of them are good outside of low levels. It doesn't matter how skilled you get as a Killer. All a Survivor has to do is run you around pallets to win, because most Killers have no way of dealing with that. Add in to the fact that a decent chunk of the Survivor playerbase are toxic on account of how braindead easy it is to win as Survivor, and you have yourself a recipe for a game that makes playing as a Killer not scary or fun in the slightest.

Honestly, anyone who tells you "this game is amazingly fun" doesn't play Killer. It's sad how the community has a double standard, where you get taunted for camping as a Killer meanwhile you're expected to put up with 4 seperate assholes running you around pallets like an animal, only for them to taunt you at every possible opportunity.

Oh, and if you're playing against a 4-man premade? You're going to wish they were never born.

I would only recommend this game if you're looking to win easily (play Survivor) or if you actually hate yourself. (Play Killer)
